doc.field: Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)
Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)

The material in this single box is focused primarily on university offices with responsibility for external relations in NYU's neighborhood. The source of much of its content, including commencement protocols, is the Office of Public Occasions, folders 8-13. Additionally, there are limited files on community relations, folder 1, and the Office of Public Relations, folders 14-15, and the University's radio station, WNYU, folder 17. In the latter two areas, financial concerns are again center stage.
Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)
